name: petsc4py
raw_meta_yaml:
context:
  name: petsc4py
  version: "3.24.0"
  build: 0
  version_xy: ${{ (version | split('.'))[:2] | join('.') }}
  python_min: ${{ python_min | default("3.10") }}
  abi3_tag: cp${{ python_min | split(".") | join("") }}
  build_abi3: ${{ is_abi3 and match(python, ">=" + python_min) }}

package:
  name: petsc4py
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/${{ name[0] }}/${{ name }}/${{ name }}-${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 3dc92ccb27a80d5bce87e186e5644ec90a3bd91569145ae1908ee6364816911b

build:
  number: ${{ build }}
  skip: win or (is_abi3 and not match(python, python_min + ".*"))
  python:
    version_independent: ${{ build_abi3 }}
  script:
    content:
    - ${{ PYTHON }} conf/cythonize.py
    - ${{ PYTHON }} -m pip -v install --no-deps .
    env:
      PETSC_DIR: "$PREFIX"
      PETSC4PY_BUILD_PYSABI: ${{ abi3_tag }}

requirements:
  build:
    - ${{ compiler('fortran') }}
    - ${{ compiler('c') }}
    - ${{ stdlib("c") }}
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then:
        - python
        - cython
        - cross-python_${{ target_platform }}
        - numpy
        - if: mpi == 'openmpi'
          then:
            - ${{ mpi }}
  host:
    - python
    - if: build_abi3
      then: python-abi3
    - cython
    - pip
    - setuptools
    - numpy
    - ${{ mpi }}
    - if: device == 'host'
      then:
        - petsc ${{ version_xy }}.* ${{ scalar }}_*
      else:
        - petsc ${{ version_xy }}.* ${{ device }}_${{ scalar }}_*
  run:
    - python
  run_constraints:
    - mpi4py >=3.0.1

tests:
  - python:
      pip_check: true
      imports:
        - petsc4py
        - petsc4py.PETSc
  
  - script:
      file: run_test
      env: 
        CONDA_BUILD: "1"
    files:
      source:
        - test/test_mat_schur.py

  - if: build_abi3
    then:
      - script:
          # verify abi3 against 3.11 instead of 3.10
          # PyObject_GetBuffer for 3.10 is abi-compatible with 3.11,
          # but not part of the 3.10 stable ABI
          - abi3audit $PREFIX/lib/python3.13/site-packages/petsc4py/lib/*.so -s -v --assume-minimum-abi3 3.11
        requirements:
          run:
            - python 3.13.*
            - abi3audit

      # for abi3, run tests against more Pythons
      - script:
          file: run_test
          env: 
            CONDA_BUILD: "1"
        files:
          source:
            - test/test_mat_schur.py
        requirements:
          run:
            - python ${{ python_min }}.*
    
      - script:
          file: run_test
          env: 
            CONDA_BUILD: "1"
        files:
          source:
            - test/test_mat_schur.py
        requirements:
          run:
            - python 3.13.*
    
about:
  summary: Python bindings for PETSc
  license: BSD-2-Clause
  license_file: LICENSE.rst
  homepage: https://petsc.org/release/petsc4py/

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - dalcinl
    - minrk
    - davidbrochart
    - SylvainCorlay
    - stefanozampini
